cause.description: The American Rights at Work Education Fund is an educational and outreach organization dedicated to informing the public about the current climate of workers’ rights and the barriers they face when working to organize unions and collective bargain with employers. We work to educate the public on the link between workers’ rights and human rights and the historical importance of the labor movement to all Americans, organized or otherwise.
cause.mission: Advance democracy in the American workplace.
cause.name: Workers' Rights
